name: tableColumnToMatchSet
displayName: Table Column Names To Match Set
description: This test defines the test TableColumnToMatchSet. Test the table columns match a set of values. Unordered by default.

parameterDefinition.name: columnNames
parameterDefinition.description: Expected columns names of the table to match the ones in {Column Names} -- should be a coma seperated string

parameterDefinition.name: ordered
parameterDefinition.description: Whether or not to considered the order of the list when performing the match check
